greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Primorial inflation of n prime shifted once: a(n) = A003961(A108951(n)).
link: Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
Index entries for sequences related to primorial numbers
formula: Completely multiplicative with a(prime(i)) = A003961(A002110(i)) = A070826(1+i). - _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 17 2020
program: A003961(n) = my(f = factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f);
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 28 2020
